Overview

  • Context: Industrial collaboration focused on optimizing the BPED process in LiOH production.
  • Goal: Improve operational efficiency and product quality under complex manufacturing conditions.
  • Outcome: Delivered modeling and anomaly detection components to support deployment-oriented workflows.

My Contributions

  • Developed a modeling framework combining ML with time-series techniques for process optimization.
  • Built real-time anomaly detection models and supported end-to-end workflows for monitoring and analysis.
  • Coordinated cross-functional project execution and documentation as data scientist/PM.

Tech Stack

  • Time Series
  • Anomaly Detection
  • ML Modeling

Notes

  • Public details are limited due to project confidentiality.
